ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Edward C. Chiasson ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. EDWARD C. CHIASSON, a Judge of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, effective December 11, 2015.
